name: Lost and Found (TomPuffs)
description:
Made in 3 days for MiniJam Lost! TomPuffs, did almost all of the programming and all of the art, while his bud StarryPen made the music, sound effects, and squashed 'dem bugs! Good fellows, the two of 'dem. Any text that ain't the logo or the play butt'n was made by Perspective Studio!

HEY YOU! Yes, YOU! I heard that you're the new recruit around here. I'm the chief, neutral to meet ya! Do as I say or GET OUT! Now, you should know that there has been a rapid increase in children going missing around these parts. I'm assigning you to find these missing children and return them to their parents.  However, time is vital in finding them, so you can't be a slowpoke about it!

What to Do? How to Play? Just look at the clues and click the child that matches 'dem clues! It ain't rocket science!
